channel.title: How do I know the coords? [ 317 - DELTA ] [ Rep++ ]
channel.description:
Ok , so I want to know how to know the coords of my inventory or any other possible sidebar interface. Example:
How do I know in what coords that white circle is in? Is there anykind of program?
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/34624jp.png[/img]
This is the coords for the equipment action button which is underneath the circle. ( so you could understand what I'm trying to say here )
[code=cmf] class9.anIntArray241[1] = 40; class9.anIntArray272[1] = 212;[/code]
For all the mods out there. [u][i] THIS IS SERVER-SIDED.[/i][/u]

item.title: How do I know the coords? [ 317 - DELTA ] [ Rep++ ]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:1, topic:370193”]Ok , so I want to know how to know the coords of my inventory or any other possible sidebar interface. Example:

How do I know in what coords that white circle is in? Is there anykind of program?

This is the coords for the equipment action button which is underneath the circle. ( so you could understand what I’m trying to say here )

class9.anIntArray241[1] = 40; class9.anIntArray272[1] = 212;

For all the mods out there.

THIS IS SERVER-SIDED.[/quote]
This problem is neither client nor server sided.

But the one I posted below , pretty much was.

Does anybody have any ideas on how to fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I know the coords? [ 317 - DELTA ] [ Rep++ ]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Paint is giving me coords like 685,429.

Its way of my siderbar interface coords.

Besides. If my client is moved, its coords are change, along with my sidebar interface’s coords ( according to Paint ). And thats not good.

What I’m trying to do is create a sidebar interface as in one of the demises servers. I succeeded. When it comes as an interface, I get this. Its fine.

But when I set it to be a sidebar interface, I get this.

How the hell can I fix this?

Read full topic
